categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Roark Garnet was a human male smuggler associated with the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War against the Galactic Empire. He flew a HWK-290 light freighter and wore a white shirt with a brown jacket. He had light skin, brown hair, and brown eyes.

In the new Star Wars canon, Roark Garnet appeared in the 2020 video game Star Wars: Starfighter Missions. He originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where he first mentioned in the 1987 first edition rulebook of Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game by West End Games.
